title: News360
description:
News360 brings the most interesting news stories from around the web, tailored individually to each one of our 7+ million users worldwide.
MILLIONS OF INTERESTS
Whether you're into Cryptocurrencies or Crochet, News360 can find the content you  care about - just select your interests when setting up the app, and News360 will keep learning about your tastes as you use it.
UNLIMITED CONTENT
More than 100,000 sources, from the top mainstream news, to local and niche websites and blogs.
NO DISTRACTIONS
A beautiful interface that allows you to quickly scan headlines, preview stories and dive deep into the content.
AT A GLANCE
Read and share news stories without opening the app by using the News360 widget.
ACCESS ANYWHERE
Save stories onto your device to read offline, on a flight or in the subway. Synchronize your interests and saved stories with News360 on your phone, tablet, Android TV, or at news360.com
• "Apps We Like: News360" — The Wall Street Journal
• "For a great news experience, the free app News360 has to be one of the better
news-aggregating [apps] I’ve seen on any platform" — The New York Times
Follow us on Twitter @news360 or on Facebook to get the latest news and updates. We welcome your feedback – write to us at support@news360.com
